description: This file contains integration tests for the 'Agent' class, testing image input and file upload functionalities using the 'Claude' model from the 'agno' project.

methods.name: test_image_input
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process an image input and verify the response content.

methods.name: test_file_upload
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process a file upload and verify the response content and citations.
